game_description: /// Jan 2022 - V5.1: MAJOR UI UPDATE + 3 NEW EXPERIENCES Imagine a door opening into an ocean of visual possibilities, a place where Aliens from out of this world use music and art to leave you astonished! A dream so synchronized with the rhythm that you wish to stay there forever and never wake up! "51 Aliens TV" is a shuffle music visualization platform. With a noble archive of Trip-Hop and Down Tempo music, 51 Aliens TV generates music based psychedelia experiences.
review_1: i thought this would be fun ..its boring as heck....dev respond s "Today This app is not for everybody, people with certain taste will find it very pleasant". who? my great-grandfather or grandma dont olay games...they are dead... kinda how this game made me feel.... now I see why you only have two reviews I'm sure the first guy is a friend of yours but this game stunk I'm glad I didn't spend 10 bucks on it it was only five but I'm still not happy with losing five dollars
